import React from 'react'; import { Col, Row } from "../components/Grid"; import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup'; /** * Render a List Group of all books passed in the props.books array. * * Also takes an `action` prop to determine the action performed by * the secondary button in the element. Valid values are `save` * and `delete`. * * The handleBookAction prop is executed when clicking the action button. * * @param {*} props */ function Booksz(props) { return ( {props.books.map((book) => (

{book.title}

{book.subtitle !== undefined && book.subtitle.length > 0 && (
{book.subtitle}
)}
{props.action === 'save' && ( )} {props.action === 'delete' && ( )}

Written by {book.authors.join(', ')}

{book.description}

 ))} ); } export default Booksz;
